Posts.Content: It takes about 6 weeks to get back to feeling normal. It may take longer for any internal changes to clear up. Perhaps one is never quite the same again.
Posts.Title: how long does radiation last in the body

Posts.Content: I think it's dangerous to encourage women with breast cancer to go against their oncologists' wishes. I followed my doctor's advice to the letter and I'm glad I did. These people spend their lives dealing with cancer and if you have a trustworthy doctor, I say follow his advice.
Posts.Title: I declined chemo & had my ovaries out instead

Posts.Content: I'm taking Aromasin and I've wondered about the same thing. The instructions say it may not start working for a while but how would one know anyhow. I don't have any answers.
Posts.Title: How Do I Know If Arimidex I Is Working
